description: This table holds information about users who have reviewed the document.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REVIEW_USER_ID
columns.description: This holds the ID of the user who reviewed this document.

columns.name: REVIEW_USER_DTTM
columns.description: This item holds the instant that a review happened.

columns.name: REVIEW_ENC_CSN
columns.description: This item holds the CSN of an encounter where a review happened. This item will only be populated if the review happened within an encounter context.
